snippet.title: World of Mines Creator's Edition Official Release Trailer - Steam
snippet.description:
The team is really happy to announce that World of Mines Creator's Edition will be officially going live on  @Steam   this May10th, 2022. We are working hard to test the many features and also plan for the future updates of the game. 

At the core, the team is confident that we wish to enhance the game along with the players on our @Steam community. We wish to once again accentuate that the team is really open to new ideas and that your feedback regarding the game really matters. For these reasons, we have implemented Steam workshops where players can actually have fun creating their own maps of the classic fun.
